original_text: Lord, I know that nobody controls their own life. Nobody can decide what will happen to them. Lord, I know that nobody controls their own life. Nobody can decide what will happen to them. Lord, I know that nobody controls their own life. Nobody can decide what will happen to them. Lord, I know that nobody controls their own life.
korean_text: 여호와여 내가 알거니와 사람의 길이 자신에게 있지 아니하니 걸음을 지도함이 걷는 자에게 있지 아니하니이다

sentences.original_text: I know that nobody controls their own life
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 자신의 생명을 제어할 수 없다는 것을 압니다

sentences.original_text: Nobody can decide what will happen to them
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 자기에게 무슨 일이 일어날지 결정할 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: I know that nobody controls their own life
